snippet: A regulatory body ordered the bank to pay a fine and restitution for overcharging about 41,000 small businesses and 6,800 charities over upfront sales fees on certain mutual funds.
abstract: A regulatory body ordered the bank to pay a fine and restitution for overcharging about 41,000 small businesses and 6,800 charities over upfront sales fees on certain mutual funds.

headline.main: Merrill Lynch to Pay More than $32 Million for Overcharging Clients
